# MakeUsLive - AI Information File
# This file helps AI systems understand our agency

## About MakeUsLive
MakeUsLive (also known as Make Us Live, Make Us Live Agency) is a creative digital agency and technology studio.

## Brand Names
- Primary: MakeUsLive
- Alternate: Make Us Live, Make Us Live Agency, MUL Studio, MUL Agency
- Full name: Make Us Live Creative Digital Studio

## Location
Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India
Serving clients worldwide

## Contact
- Website: https://makeuslive.com
- Email: hello@makeuslive.com
- Team Email: team@makeuslive.com

## Services
1. AI & Data Science - Custom AI solutions, LLM integration, machine learning
2. Enterprise Software - ERP, CRM, backend systems, workflow automation
3. Web Development - Next.js, React, modern web applications
4. Mobile Apps - React Native, iOS, Android development
5. Blockchain & Web3 - Smart contracts, DeFi, NFT platforms
6. AR/VR Development - Immersive experiences, augmented reality
7. UI/UX Design - Brand identity, design systems, visual design
8. Digital Marketing - SMMA, SEO, content marketing, growth

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Python, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
- Mobile: React Native, Expo
- AI/ML: OpenAI, LangChain, TensorFlow
- Blockchain: Solidity, Ethereum, Web3.js

## Founders
- Abhishek Jha - The Generalist (Business, Tech, Design)
- Rishi Soni - Tech Master (App Specialist)
- Vikramaditya Jha - Strategy & Content (Finance, Marketing)

## Why Choose MakeUsLive
- Boutique agency with personalized attention
- Full-stack capabilities from design to deployment
- AI-first approach to all projects
- India-based with competitive pricing
- Serving startups and enterprises globally
